import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pop-upcomponent', templateUrl: './pop-upcomponent.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pop-upcomponent.component.scss'] }) export class PopUpcomponentComponent { @Input() popUpInputObject: any; cancelButton : string = "Cancel"; ngOnInit(){ // console.log(this.popUpInputObject); } sendStatus(val:any){ console.log("sendStatus value",val); } }
